content: Caribbean at Cuba’s Cayo Anclitas, a portion of Jardines de la Reina (Gardens of the Queen) National Park encompassing a chain of 250 virgin coral and mangrove islands. It is Cuba’s first marine park and the largest no-take marine reserve in the Caribbean. It was named by Christopher Columbus to honor the Queen of Spain, Isabella I of Castile. (A “Cay” is a low bank of coral, reef, or sand.)__no.0662, 2021. #marinepark #coral #mangrove
